name: Soulstealer
description:
At the bottom of the crumbling fortress lies the last human, with its soul the transformation will be complete...

Play as a demon, and use your soul stealing ability to reach the last human and take its soul. Complete puzzles and out maneuver the robotic defenses with your different bodies stolen from creatures living in the fortress.

Levels are open ended, with multiple paths to complete every level as well as several different bodies the player can steal to change how they go through a level.
